questions.question: Try to pull from repo
questions.content: When i am trying to pull, getting error, merge conflict , from development repo
questions.author: Sasuke

answers.answer: Try git stash or git commit before pulling data
answers.author: Naruto

answers.answer: Its important to commit the uncommitted data before we push, or stash your data , then pull
answers.author: Pruce

questions.question: Merge conflict
questions.content: When i am try to pull from a branch i am getting merge isssues
questions.author: Sasuke

answers.answer: Try git stash or git commit
answers.author: Naruto

answers.answer: It is important to commit your data or stash your changes before you pull
answers.author: Pruce
